project_descr: Establish the mechanisms and processes required to implement REDD + process in Sri Lanka

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to support the Government of Sri Lanka in catalysing the establishment of key central mechanisms and processes and development of capacities required to implement REDD+ process in Sri Lanka
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

document_name: Annual Progress Report of the Sri Lanka UNREDD programme for 2014
Annual Progress Report of the UNREDD programme
RFP - Continuation of the Civil Society engagement and facilitating to mobilize the community to be prepared for REDD+ implementation (RFP-REDD/ESDR/2016/02)
RFP -Determine Non-Carbon Benefits in the context of REDD+ (RFP-ESDR/REDD/02/2015)
